text: It Happened in Penkovo () is a 1957 Soviet drama movie directed by Stanislav Rostotsky.Колхозная любовь, шекспировские страсти и робобоулинг: культурная программа на выходныеДело было в Пенькове It stars Maya Menglet, Svetlana Druzhinina, and Vyacheslav Tikhonov. ==Actors== * Maya Menglet as Tonya Glechikova * Svetlana Druzhinina as Larissa * Vyacheslav Tikhonov as Matvey Morozov * Vladimir Ratomskiy as Ivan Savich * Valentina Telegina as local newsmonger Alevtina * Anatoly Kubatsky as Glechikov == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian romance movies Category:1957 romantic drama movies Category:Russian drama movies Category:Movies directed by Stanislav Rostotsky
title: It Happened in Penkovo
